casebody.data:
EDISON FIXTURE COMPANY, INCORPORATED, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. FRANK GOFFREDO, DEFENDANT-APPELLEE. Argued October 8, 3924 Decided February 5, 1925.

Before Justices Tren chard, Hinturn and Lloyd.

For the appellant, Herman B. J.' Wechsiein. For the appellee, Thomas P. Ciorley. Pee Curiam.

This case was argued with, and is controlled by, our decision in Edison Fixture Co., Inc., v. Copoulos, No. 475, of the present term.

The judgment will be reversed and a venire de novo awarded.
